entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
